359540.name: Zombie Kill of the Week - Reborn Soundtrack
359540.description:
Zombie Kill of the Week - Reborn Soundtrack includes 7 suspenseful tracks from Zombie Kill of the Week - Reborn Soundtrack

Tracks from this album can be found in your Steam game directory under Soundtrack. They can also be played with Steam's Music Player on download.

Tracks include:
  • Track 1 - ZKW June 2015 Trailer Theme - Roland La Goy
  • Track 2 - Menu Theme - Roland La Goy
  • Track 3 - Mall Theme - Roland La Goy
  • Track 4 - Red Snow - Roland La Goy
  • Track 5 - Arise Theme - Roland La Goy
  • Track 6 - Boss Loop - Roland La Goy
  • Track 7 - Abandoned Hospital - Roland La Goy

This DLC also includes bonus desktop wallpapers for the following resolutions:
  • 1920 x 1080
  • 1280 x 720

Wallpapers can be found in your Steam game directory under Bonus Wallpapers.
359540.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
